settings.title: IN HOUSE PRINTING
settings.text: We customise apparel and give you  free desgin service!

FAST TURN-A-ROUND | QUALITY RESULTS | FREE PRINT SETUP*

We offer a free custom layout and design service.

YOUR LOGO ON YOUR APPAREL, YOUR WAY.

You provide us with your logo and branding requirements and we will show you how it will look..... FOR FREE. With our free design service you will receive a digital proof to ensure your garments are the way you want them to be. *(Embroidery setup fees may apply)

settings.heading: HEAT TRANSFER
settings.subheading:
Our In-House design, print, cut and press services means we control every step of the way.. No minimum quantities, designs are left to your imagination.
From printing full colour logos, images or just text, to adding numbers on playing shirts, shorts and other garments, we can do it all.

Let our friendly staff help you work out your best solution.

settings.heading: EMBROIDERY SERVICES
settings.subheading:
IS APPAREL offers a complete solution for all your embroidery needs.  Since 2014, we have provided this service to many businesses both small and large, ensuring their apparel is looking great. 

Our friendly staff are here to give you suggestions to get that perfect look for your logo or whatever design you may want, on your garments.

settings.heading: SCREEN PRINTING
settings.subheading:
Our professional screen printing services produces quality, long lasting designs on your T-Shirts, Polos, Vests, Shirts and much more.

With low minimums, fast turn-a-around times and quality finishes, your options are extensive.
